tsc.id as styleColorId, tsc.design_no, tsc.style_no as bulkStyleNo, tsc.style_color_pic, tsc.planning_season_id, tsc.band_code, tsc.band_name, ts.id as styleId, ts.style_pic, ts.brand, ts.brand_name, ts.prod_category1st, ts.prod_category1st_name, ts.prod_category, ts.prod_category_name, ts.prod_category2nd, ts.prod_category2nd_name, ts.prod_category3rd, ts.prod_category3rd_name, ts.registering_id, ts.registering_no, tpl.id as patternLibraryId, tpl.code as patternLibraryCode, tpl.template_code, tpl.template_name, ifnull(tpl.style_nos like CONCAT('%', tsc.style_no, '%'), 0) as transferPatternFlag, trr.*

tpb.id as bomId, tpb.bom_version_id, tpb.material_id, tpb.material_code, tpb.image_url, tpb.ingredient, tpb.translate_code, tpb.translate, group_concat(distinct tpb.color separator '\n') as color, group_concat(distinct tpb.color_code) as colorCode, tpb.bulk_unit_use, tpb.supplier_id, tpb.supplier_name, tpb.unit_code, tpi.id as packInfoId, tpi.style_color_id as styleColorId, tpi.style_no as bulkStyleNo, ts.planning_season_id, ts.prod_category1st, ts.prod_category1st_name, ts.prod_category, ts.prod_category_name, ts.prod_category2nd, ts.prod_category2nd_name, ts.prod_category3rd, ts.prod_category3rd_name, ts.id as styleId, ts.design_no, ts.brand, ts.brand_name, ts.band_code, ts.band_name, ts.style_pic, trr.*
mapper.select:
select count(0) as count, ifnull(sum( ts1.count ),0) AS useCount, ifnull(sum( ts2.count ),0) AS productionCount
, group_concat(tsc.style_no) AS bulkStyleNo
from t_style_color tsc left join t_replay_rating trr on trr.foreign_id = tsc.id and trr.type = #{ qo.type.code } left join t_style ts on ts.id = tsc.style_id left join t_pattern_library tpl on tpl.style_id = ts.id AND tpl.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN ( SELECT count(0) AS count, ts1.registering_id FROM t_style ts1 WHERE ts1.del_flag = '0' GROUP BY ts1.registering_id ) ts1 ON ts1.registering_id = tpl.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ts2.registering_id, count(0) AS count FROM t_style ts2 LEFT JOIN t_order_book tob ON tob.season_id = ts2.planning_season_id AND tob.del_flag = '0' WHERE ts2.del_flag = '0' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM t_order_book_detail tobd LEFT JOIN t_style_color tsc ON tobd.style_color_id = tsc.id AND tsc.style_id = ts2.id AND tsc.del_flag = '0' WHERE tobd.del_flag = '0' AND tobd.order_book_id = tob.id AND tobd.order_status = #{ qo.orderBookStatus.code } ) GROUP BY ts2.registering_id ) ts2 ON ts2.registering_id = tpl.id where tsc.del_flag = '0' and tsc.is_defective = '0' and tsc.scm_send_flag = '1' and tsc.status = '0'
${ ew.customSqlSegment.startsWith("WHERE")?ew.customSqlSegment.replace("WHERE","AND "):ew.customSqlSegment}
